messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 790
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/31/03 5:57:16 AM Pacific Standard Time, ... Actually I just took up skiing a few years ago.  When I was going to be alone for the first
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/31/03 5:57:16 AM Pacific Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> .
>
> Connie I applaud you for being on the slopes. I'm way too afraid of
> braking something. ;-)
>

Actually I just took up skiing a few years ago. When I was going to be alone
for the first time on Xmas day (after my marriage ended, and the kids were at
dad's), a friend invited me to join their family to ski. I am a chicken, and
never have been very athletic, but I did like it, and have continued. I'm
slow and careful, but love being on the mountain, and having that sport to do
with my kids, and other friends-or by myself-it is very peaceful.

ps- I do have very long hair - which might make up for being short!! :-)

Connie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
